TextView.android:text: Facility / Place where ANC was done
No. of Folic Acid (FA) tablets given
No. of Iron Folic Acid (IFA) tablets given
Fundal Height / Size of the uterus (in weeks)
Any other symptoms of high risk
Is pregnant woman experiencing ILI (Influenza Like Illness)
Did Pregnant woman have any contact with Covid-19 positive patients in the last 14 days?

TextView.android:hint: (Are there symptoms like Cough, Fever, Cold, Sore throat, Difficulty in Breathing?)
